author: Jason Lemon
title: Florida Governor Announces He Will Order State Residents to Stay at Home for Next 30 Days Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Florida has more than 6,700 confirmed cases of coronavirus, the fifth highest number in the United States.
content:
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis announced on Wednesday afternoon that he would sign an order telling residents to "stay at home" for the next 30 days in a effort to curb the spread of coronavirus in the state.
DeSantis, a Republican, said that the order would … [+2182 chars]
